All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Loggable

Author:
Besitzer known implementing classes: LogBuilder (abstract class with full implementation of this Interface. Should be extended by logging classes if possible) IOHandlerImpl (internal class of YaxFactory) PipelineHandlerImpl (internal class of YaxFactory) YaxTask SAXDocumentWriter
